message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this fantastic product.  Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $19,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. Can you meet me there?

Bob, thanks for your interest and counteroffer. I appreciate you seeing the value in this product. To be fair to both of us, I can't go as low as $15,000, but I'm willing to come down to $17,000. I think that's a very competitive price for what you're getting.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $17,000, but I'm still a bit shy of that. How about we meet in the middle at $16,000?
